posts.post_content:
All sold


Hi, I have some Sweet Caporal pins that I would like to sell.  Please see scans for condition.  Shipping is two bucks no matter how many pins you purchase.  Any type of payment is OK, or I will trade for a low grade T213-2 or a Weil Baking card.

$10 EACH SHIPPED OR TAKE THEM ALL FOR $24 SHIPPED  SOLD, thank you

Lot 1 is Krause.  This is a nice clean pin with a decent back.  [STRIKE]$20 [/STRIKE]

Lot 2 is Reulbach.  Nice front but the paper backing is not centered.  [STRIKE]$15[/STRIKE]

Lot 3 is Wiltse.  Nice front but the paper backing is not centered.  [STRIKE]$15[/STRIKE]

Lot 4 is a group of 4 pins.  Barger, McLean, Knight, Bescher.   The fronts have some wear and the backs are rusty and the paper backing is gone.    SOLD, THANK YOU!

Thank you!  Rick
